JUDGES: Javier Borrego Borrego;Margarita Tsatsa-Nikolovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Snejana Botoucharova;Volodymyr Butkevych
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the city of PERSON , GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant CARDINAL NORP hryvnas ( ORG ) from the ORG - owned ORG company ( Державна будівельно-промислова компанія « PERSON ) in alimonies due to the applicant by her ex - husband who was employed by the company . This judgment remains unenforced .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of PERSON rejected the applicant ’s claim against the President of GPE , ORG , ORG and ORG for compensation for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage inflicted by the non - enforcement of the judgment in her favour .

CARDINAL . By an order of ORG dated DATE , the debtor company was liquidated and a liquidation commission established . As a result , ORG terminated the enforcement proceedings in the applicant ’s case and the writ of enforcement was forwarded to the liquidation commission . The liquidation proceedings are still pending .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG and Others v. GPE ( nos . CARDINAL/CARDINAL and foll . , § § DATE , ORG CARDINALXII ) .
